attributes.action: Counteract bank branch closures and the reduction in their opening hours by preventing British banks from trading on the international markets whilst less than 20% of their branches are open.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The banks in Britain will delay transactions that do not benefit them citing that they do not process them outside of working hours.

Miraculously, however, transactions that do benefit them are carried out almost instantly and the banks are happy to keep their offices open around the clock to trade on the world markets. A profit driven motive.

In a society that is increasingly adopting a 24/7 work ethic now is the time for the banks to catch up with other vital industries and process customer transactions around the clock.
